title.@value: EXTRACT KEY VALUE PAIRS FROM JSON F-SECURE MESSAGE

source.@value:
pipeline "WAZUH PROCESSING PIPELINES"
stage 0 match pass
rule "DROP OSQUERY SOCKET EVENTS - WELL KNOWN PROCESSES"
rule "DROP OSQUERY PROCESS EVENTS - WELL KNOWN PROCESSES"
rule "DROP SYSMON EVT 7 LOGS - WELL KNOWN PROCESS IMAGE"
rule "DROP SYSMON EVT 12 LOGS - WELL KNOWN PROCESS IMAGE"
rule "DROP SYSMON EVT 10 LOGS - WELL KNOWN SOURCE PROCESS IMAGE"
rule "DROP SYSMON EVT 13 LOGS - WELL KNOWN PROCESS IMAGE"
stage 1 match either
rule "WAZUH CREATE FIELD SYSLOG LEVEL - NOTICE"
rule "WAZUH CREATE FIELD SYSLOG LEVEL - WARNING"
rule "WAZUH CREATE FIELD SYSLOG LEVEL - INFO"
rule "WAZUH CREATE FIELD SYSLOG LEVEL - ALERT"
rule "Linux Sysmon Timestamp - UTC"
rule "Office365 Timestamp - UTC"
rule "Osquery Epoch Timestamp - UTC"
rule "Packetbeat Timestamp - UTC"
rule "Windows Timestamp - UTC"
rule "URL Encode data_name field for ASK SOCFortress API"
rule "NIST 800-53 TO CUI MAPPING"
stage 2 match pass
rule "USER ADDED TO PRIVILEGE ADMIN GROUP"
rule "ASK SOCFORTRESS WINDOWS - CHAINSAW"
stage 3 match either
rule "LINUX SYSMON EVENT 1 LOG NORMALIZATION"
rule "LINUX SYSMON EVENT 5 LOG NORMALIZATION"
rule "LINUX SYSMON EVENT 9 LOG NORMALIZATION"
rule "LINUX SYSMON EVENT 11 LOG NORMALIZATION"
rule "LINUX SYSMON EVENT 23 LOG NORMALIZATION"
rule "LINUX PACKETBEAT DNS LOG NORMALIZATION"
rule "WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 1 LOG NORMALIZATION"
rule "WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 11 LOG NORMALIZATION"
rule "WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 2 LOG NORMALIZATION"
rule "WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 22 LOG NORMALIZATION"
rule "WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 23 LOG NORMALIZATION"
rule "WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 5 LOG NORMALIZATION"
rule "WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 9 LOG NORMALIZATION"
rule "WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 7 LOG NORMALIZATION"
rule "WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 10 LOG NORMALIZATION"
rule "WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 12 LOG NORMALIZATION"
rule "WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 13 LOG NORMALIZATION"
rule "WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 17 LOG NORMALIZATION"
rule "LINUX OSQUERY PROCESS LIST LOG NORMALIZATION"
rule "LINUX PACKETBEAT NETWORK LOG NORMALIZATION"
rule "LINUX SYSMON EVENT 3 INBOUND CONNECTION LOG NORMALIZATION"
rule "LINUX SYSMON EVENT 3 OUTBOUND CONNECTION LOG NORMALIZATION"
rule "WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 3 INBOUND CONNECTION LOG NORMALIZATION"
rule "WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 3 OUTBOUND CONNECTION LOG NORMALIZATION"
rule "WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 15 LOG NORMALIZATION"
rule "OSSEC SYSCHECK ADDED EVENT NORMALIZATION"
rule "EPSS CVE Criticality"
rule "EPSS CVE Criticality - NMAP"
rule "WINDOWS PROCESS ID - No EventData Field"
rule "WINDOWS PROCESS ID - Non SOCFortress Sysmon"
rule "Timestamp Failsafe - UTC"
rule "LINUX OSQUERY-BPF PROCESS LIST LOG NORMALIZATION"
rule "WINDOWS PROCESS ID - SIGMA - data_system_Execution_attributes_ProcessID"
rule "WINDOWS PROCESS ID - SIGMA - data_event_ProcessId"
rule "WINDOWS PROCESS ID - SIGMA - data_event_SourceProcessId"
rule "LINUX OSQUERY PROCESS ID - GENERIC"
rule "MacOS OSQUERY PROCESS_EVENTS LOG NORMALIZATION"
rule "OpenAudit Remove field - data_system_network_item_dhcp_lease_obtained"
rule "OpenAudit Remove field - data_system_software_item_install_date"
stage 4 match pass
rule "WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 1 - SOFTWARE VENDORS"
rule "WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 1 - EMPTY SOFTWARE VENDORS"
rule "WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 7 - SOFTWARE VENDORS"
rule "WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 7 - EMPTY SOFTWARE VENDORS"
rule "WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 3 - NETWORK PORTS"
stage 5 match pass
rule "WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 1 - UNAPPROVED SOFTWARE VENDORS"
rule "WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 7 - UNAPPROVED SOFTWARE VENDORS"
rule "WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 3 - UNCOMMON PORT"
stage 7 match either
rule "OVERRIDE SYSLOG LEVEL AFTER IoC FOUND"
stage 6 match either
rule "LINUX SYSMON EVENT 3 - SOCFORTRESS THREAT INTEL"
rule "OSSEC SYSCHECK ADDED - SOCFORTRESS THREAT INTEL"
rule "PACKETBEAT DNS QUERY - SOCFORTRESS THREAT INTEL"
rule "PACKETBEAT HTTP/S CONNECTION - SOCFORTRESS THREAT INTEL"
rule "WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 1 - SOCFORTRESS THREAT INTEL"
rule "WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 15 - SOCFORTRESS THREAT INTEL"
rule "WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 22 - SOCFORTRESS THREAT INTEL"
rule "WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 3 - SOCFORTRESS THREAT INTEL"
rule "WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 6 - SOCFORTRESS THREAT INTEL"
rule "WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 7 - SOCFORTRESS THREAT INTEL"
end

title.@value: LINUX SYSMON EVENT 3 - SOCFORTRESS THREAT INTEL

description.@value: LINUX SYSMON EVENT 3 - SOCFORTRESS THREAT INTEL

source.@value:
rule "WINDOWS PROCESS ID - SIGMA - data_system_Execution_attributes_ProcessID"
when
 has_field("data_system_Execution_attributes_ProcessID") AND $message.rule_group1 == "windows" AND $message.rule_group2 == "chainsaw"
then
 set_field("process_id", $message.data_system_Execution_attributes_ProcessID);
end

title.@value: OVERRIDE SYSLOG LEVEL AFTER IoC FOUND

description.@value: OVERRIDE SYSLOG LEVEL AFTER IoC FOUND

source.@value:
rule "OVERRIDE SYSLOG LEVEL AFTER IoC FOUND"
when
 has_field("threat_intel_value")
then
 set_field("syslog_level", "ALERT");
end

title.@value: DROP SYSMON EVT 12 LOGS - WELL KNOWN PROCESS IMAGE

description.@value: DROP SYSMON EVT 12 LOGS - WELL KNOWN PROCESS IMAGE

source.@value:
rule "DROP SYSMON EVT 12 LOGS - WELL KNOWN PROCESS IMAGE"
when
$message.rule_group3 == "sysmon_event_12" AND ($message.data_win_eventdata_image == "C:\\\\Program Files\\\\ATERA Networks\\\\AteraAgent\\\\Packages\\\\AgentPackageHeartbeat\\\\AgentPackageHeartbeat.exe" OR $message.data_win_eventdata_image == "C:\\\\WINDOWS\\\\system32\\\\svchost.exe" OR $message.data_win_eventdata_image == "C:\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\svchost.exe" OR $message.data_win_eventdata_image == "C:\\\\Windows\\\\system32\\\\svchost.exe")
then
 drop_message();
end

title.@value: PACKETBEAT DNS QUERY - SOCFORTRESS THREAT INTEL

description.@value: PACKETBEAT DNS QUERY - SOCFORTRESS THREAT INTEL

title.@value: OSSEC SYSCHECK ADDED - SOCFORTRESS THREAT INTEL

description.@value: OSSEC SYSCHECK ADDED - SOCFORTRESS THREAT INTEL

title.@value: DROP OSQUERY PROCESS EVENTS - WELL KNOWN PROCESSES

description.@value: DROP OSQUERY PROCESS EVENTS - WELL KNOWN PROCESSES

source.@value:
rule "DROP OSQUERY PROCESS EVENTS - WELL KNOWN PROCESSES"
when
$message.rule_group2 == "process_events" AND ($message.data_columns_path == "/usr/bin/ls" OR $message.data_columns_path == "/usr/bin/ps" OR $message.data_columns_path == "/usr/bin/sleep" OR $message.data_columns_path == "/usr/bin/awk" OR $message.data_columns_path == "/var/ossec/bin/wazuh-control" OR $message.data_columns_path == "/usr/bin/runc" OR $message.data_columns_path == "/usr/libexec/docker/docker-init")
then
 drop_message();
end

rule "Linux Sysmon Timestamp - UTC"
when
 has_field("data_system_systemTime")
then
 let time = parse_date(to_string($message.data_system_systemTime), "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSSSS'Z'", "Etc/UTC");
 set_field("timestamp_utc", time);
end

title.@value: WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 22 - SOCFORTRESS THREAT INTEL

description.@value: WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 22 - SOCFORTRESS THREAT INTEL

title.@value: DROP OSQUERY SOCKET EVENTS - WELL KNOWN PROCESSES

description.@value: DROP OSQUERY SOCKET EVENTS - WELL KNOWN PROCESSES

source.@value:
rule "DROP OSQUERY SOCKET EVENTS - WELL KNOWN PROCESSES"
when
$message.rule_group2 == "bpf_socket_events" AND ($message.data_columns_path == "/var/ossec/bin/wazuh-syscheckd" OR $message.data_columns_path == "/usr/bin/telegraf" OR $message.data_columns_path == "/usr/sbin/haproxy" OR $message.data_columns_path == "/var/ossec/bin/wazuh-control" OR $message.data_columns_path == "/opt/fluent-bit/bin/fluent-bit" OR $message.data_columns_path == "/var/ossec/framework/python/bin/python3.9" OR $message.data_columns_path == "/var/ossec/bin/wazuh-remoted" OR $message.data_columns_path == "/usr/share/filebeat/bin/filebeat" OR $message.data_columns_path == "/var/ossec/bin/wazuh-modulesd" OR $message.data_columns_path == "/worker" OR $message.data_columns_path == "/usr/bin/python3.9" OR $message.data_columns_path == "/usr/local/bin/python3.10" OR $message.data_columns_path == "/usr/local/sbin/haproxy" OR $message.data_columns_path == "/usr/bin/systemctl" OR $message.data_columns_path == "/usr/local/bin/python3.9" OR $message.data_columns_path == "/app/webapp" OR $message.data_columns_path == "/usr/share/graylog-server/jvm/bin/java" OR $message.data_columns_path == "/usr/share/grafana/bin/grafana" OR $message.data_columns_path == "/usr/bin/dockerd" OR $message.data_columns_path == "/usr/local/bin/velociraptor.bin")
then
 drop_message();
end

title.@value: DROP SYSMON EVT 13 LOGS - WELL KNOWN PROCESS IMAGE

description.@value: DROP SYSMON EVT 13 LOGS - WELL KNOWN PROCESS IMAGE

source.@value:
rule "DROP SYSMON EVT 13 LOGS - WELL KNOWN PROCESS IMAGE"
when
$message.rule_group3 == "sysmon_event_13" AND ($message.data_win_eventdata_image == "C:\\\\WINDOWS\\\\system32\\\\svchost.exe" OR $message.data_win_eventdata_image == "C:\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\svchost.exe" OR $message.data_win_eventdata_image == "C:\\\\Windows\\\\system32\\\\svchost.exe" OR $message.data_win_eventdata_image == "C:\\\\Program Files\\\\Google\\\\Chrome\\\\Application\\\\chrome.exe")
then
 drop_message();
end

title.@value: WAZUH CREATE FIELD SYSLOG LEVEL - WARNING

source.@value:
rule "WAZUH CREATE FIELD SYSLOG LEVEL - WARNING"
when to_long($message.rule_level) > 7 AND to_long($message.rule_level) < 12
then
set_field("syslog_level", "WARNING");
end

title.@value: WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 3 OUTBOUND CONNECTION LOG NORMALIZATION

description.@value: WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 3 OUTBOUND CONNECTION LOG NORMALIZATION

source.@value:
rule "WINDOWS PROCESS ID - SIGMA - data_event_ProcessId"
when
 has_field("data_event_ProcessId") AND $message.rule_group1 == "windows" AND $message.rule_group2 == "chainsaw"
then
 set_field("process_id", $message.data_event_ProcessId);
end

rule "WINDOWS PROCESS ID - SIGMA - data_event_SourceProcessId"
when
 has_field("data_event_SourceProcessId") AND $message.rule_group1 == "windows" AND $message.rule_group2 == "chainsaw"
then
 set_field("process_id", $message.data_event_SourceProcessId);
end

LINUX SYSMON EVENT 3 OUTBOUND CONNECTION LOG NORMALIZATION

title.@value: WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 3 - SOCFORTRESS THREAT INTEL

description.@value: WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 3 - SOCFORTRESS THREAT INTEL

source.@value:
rule "Packetbeat Timestamp - UTC"
when
 has_field("data_event_start")
then
 let time = parse_date(to_string($message.data_event_start), "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSSSS'Z'", "Etc/UTC");
 set_field("timestamp_utc", time);
end

title.@value: WAZUH CREATE FIELD SYSLOG LEVEL - NOTICE

description.@value: WAZUH CREATE FIELD SYSLOG LEVEL - NOTICE

source.@value:
rule "WAZUH CREATE FIELD SYSLOG LEVEL - NOTICE"
when to_long($message.rule_level) > 3 AND to_long($message.rule_level) < 8
then
set_field("syslog_level", "NOTICE");
end

title.@value: WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 6 - SOCFORTRESS THREAT INTEL

description.@value: WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 6 - SOCFORTRESS THREAT INTEL

source.@value:
rule "LINUX OSQUERY PROCESS ID - GENERIC"
when
$message.rule_group1 == "osquery"
then
 set_field("process_id", $message.data_columns_pid);
end

title.@value: WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 1 - SOCFORTRESS THREAT INTEL

description.@value: WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 1 - SOCFORTRESS THREAT INTEL

title.@value: WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 7 - EMPTY SOFTWARE VENDORS

description.@value: WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 7 - EMPTY SOFTWARE VENDORS

Set Timestamp based upon `msg_timestamp` field which is the time Graylog ingested the message. This is a failsafe to catch if no other field names have been detected in the log that provide the timestamp value that the host assigned with the raw alert.

title.@value: WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 15 - SOCFORTRESS THREAT INTEL

description.@value: WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 15 - SOCFORTRESS THREAT INTEL

title.@value: WAZUH CREATE FIELD SYSLOG LEVEL - INFO

description.@value: WAZUH CREATE FIELD SYSLOG LEVEL - INFO

source.@value:
rule "WAZUH CREATE FIELD SYSLOG LEVEL - INFO"
when to_long($message.rule_level) > 0 AND to_long($message.rule_level) < 4
then
set_field("syslog_level", "INFO");
end

title.@value: DROP SYSMON EVT 10 LOGS - WELL KNOWN SOURCE PROCESS IMAGE

description.@value: DROP SYSMON EVT 10 LOGS - WELL KNOWN SOURCE PROCESS IMAGE

source.@value:
rule "DROP SYSMON EVT 10 LOGS - WELL KNOWN SOURCE PROCESS IMAGE"
when
$message.rule_group3 == "sysmon_event_10" AND $message.data_win_eventdata_sourceImage == "C:\\\\Program Files\\\\ATERA Networks\\\\AteraAgent\\\\AteraAgent.exe"
then
 drop_message();
end

title.@value: DROP SYSMON EVT 7 LOGS - WELL KNOWN PROCESS IMAGE

description.@value: DROP SYSMON EVT 7 LOGS - WELL KNOWN PROCESS IMAGE

source.@value:
rule "DROP SYSMON EVT 7 LOGS - WELL KNOWN PROCESS IMAGE"
when
$message.rule_group3 == "sysmon_event7" AND 
($message.data_win_eventdata_image == "C:\\\\Program Files\\\\ATERA Networks\\\\AteraAgent\\\\Packages\\\\AgentPackageHeartbeat\\\\AgentPackageHeartbeat.exe" 
OR $message.data_win_eventdata_image == "C:\\\\Program Files\\\\ATERA Networks\\\\AteraAgent\\\\Packages\\\\AgentPackageSTRemote\\\\AgentPackageSTRemote.exe" 
OR $message.data_win_eventdata_image == "C:\\\\Program Files\\\\ATERA Networks\\\\AteraAgent\\\\Packages\\\\AgentPackageMonitoring\\\\AgentPackageMonitoring.exe" 
OR $message.data_win_eventdata_image == "C:\\\\Program Files\\\\ATERA Networks\\\\AteraAgent\\\\Packages\\\\AgentPackageInternalPoller\\\\AgentPackageInternalPoller.exe")
then
 drop_message();
end

rule "Windows Timestamp - UTC"
when
 has_field("data_win_system_systemTime")
then
 let time = parse_date(to_string($message.data_win_system_systemTime), "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSSSS'Z'", "Etc/UTC");
 set_field("timestamp_utc", time);
end

title.@value: WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 1 - EMPTY SOFTWARE VENDORS

description.@value: WINDOWS SYSMON EVENT 1 - EMPTY SOFTWARE VENDORS

title.@value: WINDOWS PROCESS ID - Non SOCFortress Sysmon

description.@value: WINDOWS PROCESS ID - Non SOCFortress Sysmon

source.@value:
rule "WINDOWS PROCESS ID - Non SOCFortress Sysmon"
when
 $message.rule_group1 != "windows" AND has_field("data_win_eventdata_processId")
then
 set_field("process_id", $message.data_win_eventdata_processId);
end

title.@value: WAZUH CREATE FIELD SYSLOG LEVEL - ALERT

source.@value:
rule "WAZUH CREATE FIELD SYSLOG LEVEL - ALERT"
when to_long($message.rule_level) > 11
then
set_field("syslog_level", "ALERT");
end

title.@value: USER ADDED TO PRIVILEGE ADMIN GROUP

description.@value: USER ADDED TO PRIVILEGE ADMIN GROUP

source.@value:
rule "OSSEC SYSCHECK ADDED EVENT NORMALIZATION"
when
 $message.rule_group1 == "ossec" AND $message.rule_group2 == "syscheck" AND $message.syscheck_event == "added"
then
 set_field("sha256", $message.syscheck_sha256_after);
end

title.@value: WINDOWS PROCESS ID - No EventData Field

description.@value: WINDOWS PROCESS ID - No EventData Field

source.@value:
rule "WINDOWS PROCESS ID - No EventData Field"
when
 ! has_field("data_win_eventdata_processId") AND $message.rule_group1 == "windows"
then
 set_field("process_id", $message.data_win_system_processID);
end

title.@value: LINUX OSQUERY-BPF PROCESS LIST LOG NORMALIZATION

description.@value: LINUX OSQUERY-BPF PROCESS LIST LOG NORMALIZATION

source.@value:
rule "Office365 Timestamp - UTC"
when
 has_field("data_office_365_CreationTime")
then
 let creation_time = $message.data_office_365_CreationTime;
 set_field("timestamp_utc", creation_time);
end

title.@value: URL Encode data_name field for ASK SOCFortress API

description.@value: URL Encode `data_name` field for ASK SOCFortress API

source.@value:
rule "URL Encode data_name field for ASK SOCFortress API"
when
 has_field("data_name") AND $message.rule_group2 == "chainsaw" AND $message.data_logsource_product == "windows"
then
 let replaced = replace(to_string($message.data_name), " ", "%20");
 set_field("sigma_name_encoded", replaced);
end
